landing.header.title: Receive payments from your stores safely
landing.header.description: Implement a payment gateway for your online store. fast, safe and hassle-free. Start billing today without having any requirements.
landing.section.two.title: The best payment solutions for you
landing.section.two.description.1: Fastwpay is an exclusive payment gateway plugin for
landing.section.two.description.2: made for all those entrepreneurs, startups and companies that would like to start charging for their online business without having to comply with all the bureaucracy involved in hiring any provider of this service.
landing.section.two.startNow.title: Start now
landing.section.two.security.title: Security
landing.section.two.security.content: Security system with high level of data encryption.
landing.section.two.adminPanel.title: Admin Panel
landing.section.two.adminPanel.content: Manage your information and API keys from your account.
landing.section.two.support.title: Support
landing.section.two.support.content: Contact us for information and usage support.
landing.section.three.title: How to install & activate
landing.section.three.description: If it is the first time that you install a plugin for wordpress, then we explain in 3 simple steps how you can do it.
landing.section.four.1.title: Download the file
landing.section.four.1.description: the fastwpay.zip file on your computer.
landing.section.four.2.title: Upload the plugin in wordpress
landing.section.four.2.1.description: In the WordPress panel of your store website, go to the
landing.section.four.2.3.description: button and upload the fastwpay.zip file.
landing.section.four.3.title: Insert the api key
landing.section.four.3.1.description: To activate, create an API key in your Fastwpay account and copy it. Then go to the
landing.section.four.3.2.description: in your Wordpress panel of your store, paste in the API key field and save the changes.
landing.banner.title: Free to install & use
landing.banner.description: To use it you don't need to buy it, it's completely free, and you can use it in all the online stores you want. Fastwpay only charges a small commission of 8% per purchase made.
landing.section.five.title: Countries where it works
landing.section.five.description: To have an account in Fastwpay, the bank account of the owner of the online store must be located in
landing.contact.title: Get in touch with us
auth.signup.alReadyAccount: Do you already have an account with us?
auth.resetPassword.text: Enter your email address and we will send you a password reset link
auth.text.sendVerifyEmail: We have sent you an email so that you can verify your email and you can finish the registration!!
auth.text.resetPasswordEmail: we have sent an email go there and follow the prompts to reset the password
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.bannerBlue.text: This plugin is free and only charges commission per sale
apiKey.title: API key
apiKey.activatingYourPlugin.text: API keys are used to activate your plugins after installing them on your online store. To activate your product and enable plugin updates, simply enter your API Key in the settings tab within your WordPress Dashboard of your online store.
apiKey.yourApikeys.text: They can create new API Keys for different Online Stores and/or different clients. You can also disable or delete API keys that are no longer in use and those sites will no longer receive updates. You can create as many API keys as you need, but you can only use one per store.
